COCKTAIL TABLE RESERVATIONS

Menu
COCKTAIL TABLE RESERVATIONS
Upcoming Events
SPECIAL EVENTS
Join us at our upcoming special events for tropical drinks, curated food, groovy music & stunning waterfront views at the heart of the Coconut Grove!
EVERY THIRD THURSDAY
COCONUT GROVE CIGAR SOCIAL
Get ready for a night of smooth vibes and bold flavor at the Coconut Grove Cigar Social, happening every third Thursday from 6 PM to 9 PM! Join us alongside CigarPhone and Cigar Snob for an evening where premium cigars, laid-back conversation, and waterfront ambiance come together in perfect harmony. Sip and savor with unbeatable drink specials, including half-priced martinis from open til’ close.
Complimentary rsvp
TABLE RESERVATIONS
EVERY THIRD THURSDAY
COCONUT GROVE CIGAR SOCIAL
Get ready for a night of smooth vibes and bold flavor at the Coconut Grove Cigar Social, happening every third Thursday from 6 PM to 9 PM! Join us alongside CigarPhone and Cigar Snob for an evening where premium cigars, laid-back conversation, and waterfront ambiance come together in perfect harmony. Sip and savor with unbeatable drink specials, including half-priced martinis from open til’ close.
Complimentary rsvp
TABLE RESERVATIONS
SATURDAY NOVEMBER 22ND
THE MERCADITO
Join us on Saturday, November 22nd for a special afternoon with The Mercadito at Regatta Grove—a chic open-air market pop-up featuring a curated selection of emerging brands, local artists, and one-of-a-kind finds. Whether you’re hanging with friends, exploring solo, or looking for the perfect gift, The Mercadito is your go-to for good vibes, great bites, and a stylish shopping experience—all set to a soundtrack of feel-good tunes.
Complimentary rsvp
TABLE RESERVATIONS
SATURDAY NOVEMBER 22ND
THE MERCADITO
Join us on Saturday, November 22nd for a special afternoon with The Mercadito at Regatta Grove—a chic open-air market pop-up featuring a curated selection of emerging brands, local artists, and one-of-a-kind finds. Whether you’re hanging with friends, exploring solo, or looking for the perfect gift, The Mercadito is your go-to for good vibes, great bites, and a stylish shopping experience—all set to a soundtrack of feel-good tunes.
Complimentary rsvp
TABLE RESERVATIONS
Weekly EVENTS
Every Thursday through Sunday, join us day and night for tropical drinks, curated food, groovy music & stunning waterfront views at the heart of the Coconut Grove!
EVERY THURSDAY
Shaken Not Stirred
Sip in style at Shaken Not Stirred.  We’re serving up style and sophistication weekly at our exclusive Martini Bar Pop-Up, where you can enjoy half-priced martinis from open ‘til close. Whether you’re craving a classic, something a little dirty, or a modern twist, our bartenders are ready to shake things up just right. It’s the perfect excuse to dress up, sip slow, and toast to the weekend early. Don’t miss the kickoff—Thursdays have officially become martini night!
Complimentary rsvp
TABLE RESERVATIONS
EVERY THURSDAY

Whether you’re craving a classic, something a little dirty, or a modern twist, our bartenders are ready to shake things up just right. It’s the perfect excuse to dress up, sip slow, and toast to the weekend early. Don’t miss the kickoff—Thursdays have officially become martini night!
Complimentary rsvp
TABLE RESERVATIONS
EVERY FRIDAY
HAPPY HOUR
Friday, join us as we sail onto your new favorite Friday Happy Hour featuring half off specialty cocktails from 4 PM – 7 PM. Plus, enjoy tropical drinks, curated food, groovy music & stunning waterfront views at the heart of the Coconut Grove!
Complimentary rsvp
TABLE RESERVATIONS
EVERY SATURDAY
SIP, savor, celebrate
Join us as we invite you to the return of Sip, Savor, Celebrate every Saturday, featuring tropical drinks, curated food, groovy music & stunning waterfront views at the heart of the Coconut Grove!
Complimentary rsvp

TABLE RESERVATIONS
EVERY SUNDAY
SmoOTH SAILING
Come aboard as we celebrate Smooth Sailing every Sunday. Sail away into the afternoon with tropical drinks, curated food & groovy music on Coconut Grove’s stunning waterfront.
Complimentary rsvp

COCKTAIL TABLE RESERVATIONS

Menu
COCKTAIL TABLE RESERVATIONS
About
Introduction
Regatta
Regatta, owned and operated by Breakwater Hospitality Group, is an open-air premier destination located at the heart of the historic Coconut Grove in Miami. The communal gathering spot, which hugs the Biscayne Bay shoreline, comes to life with an elite food and beverage program, groovy music, and lofty waterfront views that together offer a relaxed, yet elevated experience.
Waterfront
Regatta delivers the perfect mix of waterfront locale, rural atmosphere and community appeal in Miami’s oldest neighborhood. We proudly serve local and visiting intellectuals, adventurers and families looking for a tasteful and utterly chic outing by the water.
Sip, savor, CELEBRATE
Whether guests arrive by car, boat or bicycle, they’ll step into a refined social gathering spot that extends a nod to the spirit of Coconut Grove’s past while unveiling a progressive look at its exciting future. Patrons can expect to savor in culinary concepts by world-renowned chefs, quality craft cocktails, the magnificent views of boats sailing, and the sounds of warm, uplifting beats; these contrasting elements which together add a touch of familiarity to a newfound place.
Incomparable views
Located close to the historic Miami City Hall, Regatta is a lively, charming incomparable scene for those looking to escape from the hustle and bustle of city life.
Our Mission
Our mission is to craft a distinctive experience on the
historic waterfront of Biscayne Bay that revitalizes and reimagines Coconut Grove’s vibrant community.

Private Events
HOST AN EVENT
Embrace the nautical spirit at Regatta, offering a maritime-inspired setting, a culinary line-up by award winning chefs, and an array of specialty cocktails for your private event. Fill out the form below and one of our representatives will contact you as soon as possible.
